trans-unit.source: Represents the parameters for supporting security tokens required by the security binding element.
This class is a collection of token properties and methods, and is used in creating security binding elements and tokens.
Supporting tokens specify encryption and signing requirements.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters"></xref> class.
The new instance property values are set to their defaults:
<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.InclusionMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenInclusionMode.AlwaysToRecipient>.
<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.ReferenceStyle%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenReferenceStyle.Internal>.
<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.RequireDerivedKeys%2A> is set to `true`.
Clones another instance of this instance of the class.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters"></xref>.
Clones another instance of this instance of the class.
A new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters"></xref>.
Gets a collection of security token parameters for endorsing supporting tokens required by the security binding element.
Endorsing tokens sign the message signature.
A collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters"></xref>.
Sets a value that indicates whether all endorsing or signed endorsing token parameters require derived keys.

Each <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters> in <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.Endorsing%2A> or in <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.SignedEndorsing%2A> has its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.RequireDerivedKeys%2A> property set to `requireDerivedKeys`.
A <xref href="System.Boolean"></xref> that determines whether parameters require derived keys.
Gets a collection of security token parameters for signed supporting tokens required by the security binding element.
Signed tokens are included in the message signature.
A collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters"></xref>.
Gets a collection of security token parameters for signed and encrypted supporting tokens required by the security binding element.
Signed tokens are included in the message signature and are encrypted.
A collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters"></xref>.
Gets a collection of security token parameters for signed and endorsing supporting tokens required by the security binding element.
Signed endorsing tokens sign the message signature token and are themselves signed by the message signature.
A collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters"></xref>.
Displays a text representation of this instance of the class.

The output string displays the result of performing the `ToString()` method on each of the tokens in <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.Endorsing%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.Signed%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.SignedEncrypted%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.SignedEndorsing%2A>.
A text representation of this instance of this class.
